violations.issue: Story 4's means is a subclass of Story 3's means, indicating a superclass-subclass coupling
violations.suggestion: Replace superclass with explicit subtype or split Story 3 per subtype
original_stories: As a User, I want to view my profile so that I can check my information.
As a User, I want to edit content so that I can fix mistakes.

violations.issue: Story 2's means requires Story 1's means to be executed first, indicating a causality relation
violations.suggestion: Add an explicit dependency between Story 2 and Story 1
original_stories: As a User, I want to create a profile so that I can use the system.

violations.issue: Story 10's means likely requires Story 9's means to be executed first, indicating a causality relation
violations.suggestion: Add an explicit dependency between Story 10 and Story 9
original_stories: As a Viewer, I want to view incident's status so that I can stay informed.
As a Traveler, I want to search for flights so that I can book a ticket.

violations.issue: Story 8's means likely requires Story 7's means to be executed first or at least for an incident status to be updated, indicating a causality relation
violations.suggestion: Add an explicit dependency between Story 8 and Story 7
original_stories: As a User, I want to update my email address so that I can keep my account current.
As an Analyst, I want to update an incident’s status so that I can reflect current triage progress.

violations.issue: Story 3 and Story 4 have semantically identical ends
violations.suggestion: Consolidate or differentiate the ends to make the stories distinct
original_stories: As a User, I want to view my profile so that I can check my information.
As a User, I want to edit content so that I can fix mistakes.

expected_stories: As a User, I want to create a profile so that I can use the system.
As a User, I want to view my profile so that I can check my information.
As a User, I want to edit content so that I can fix mistakes.
As a User, I want to edit video and photo content so that I can fix mistakes.
As a Traveler, I want to search for flights so that I can book a ticket.
As a Traveler, I want to book a ticket so that I can travel.

story_mapping.1: As a User, I want to create a profile so that I can use the system.
story_mapping.2: As a User, I want to view my profile so that I can check my information.
story_mapping.3: As a User, I want to edit content so that I can fix mistakes.
story_mapping.4: As a User, I want to edit video and photo content so that I can fix mistakes.
story_mapping.5: As a User, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access.
story_mapping.6: As a User, I want to update my email address so that I can keep my account current.
story_mapping.7: As an Analyst, I want to update an incident’s status so that I can reflect current triage progress.
story_mapping.8: As a Viewer, I want to view incident's status so that I can stay informed.
story_mapping.9: As a Traveler, I want to search for flights so that I can book a ticket.
story_mapping.10: As a Traveler, I want to book a ticket so that I can travel.
